img_above_text:
Go out here and toward the statues to collect the Amber Prayer Beads curio from the box.
Amber Prayer Beads
img_below_text:
Go back inside the cave and now turn right to collect the green Wisp. Take out the Revenant near it, then go forward.
![Woods Ember Walkthrough \(98\).png](https://oyster.ignimgs.com/mediawiki/apis.ign.com/black-myth-wukong/a/a3/Woods_Ember_Walkthrough_%2898%29.png)

img_summary: The image depicts a dark, eerie cave with intricately carved stone pillars featuring demonic faces. A character, likely the player, is seen approaching a green Wisp, which is highlighted with a red marker. The scene suggests that the player needs to collect the Wisp and possibly engage with a nearby Revenant enemy, as indicated by the context provided.
